perturbation.original_text:
Payment Schedule: Client shall pay Developer:
20% Deposit ($55,800.00) to be paid at the start of the project. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #1. 20% ($55,800.00) to be
paid upon completion of Milestone #2.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #3.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #4.
*Milestone Delivery Schedule for Phase 1
Milestone #1 –January 1st, 2019
Milestone #2- February 1st, 2019.
Milestone #3 – March 1st, 2019.
Milestone #4 – April 1st, 2019.
perturbation.changed_text:
Payment Schedule: Client shall remit to Seattle Software Developers:
20% Deposit ($55,800.00) to be paid at the commencement of the project. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #1. 20% ($55,800.00) to be
paid upon completion of Milestone #2.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #3.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #4.
*Milestone Delivery Schedule for Phase 1
Milestone #1 –January 1st, 2019
Milestone #2- February 1st, 2019.
Milestone #3 – March 1st, 2019.
Milestone #4 – April 1st, 2019.
perturbation.explanation: The terms "pay" and "remit" and "start" and "commencement" are used interchangeably, creating potential ambiguity as to the exact method and timing of payments. Are they required to pay in cash, or is a remittance transfer sufficient? Should the project start before or after deposit?

perturbation.original_text:
4. Fee Payment Schedule
Fees: The Fees for the Project shall be $279,000.00
Payment Schedule: Client shall pay Developer:
20% Deposit ($55,800.00) to be paid at the start of the project. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #1. 20% ($55,800.00) to be
paid upon completion of Milestone #2.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #3.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #4.
perturbation.changed_text:
4. Fee Payment Schedule
Costs: The Charges for the Project shall be $279,000.00
Payment Schedule: Client shall pay Developer:
20% Deposit ($55,800.00) to be paid at the start of the project. 20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #1. 20% ($55,800.00) to be
paid upon completion of Milestone #2.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #3.
20% ($55,800.00) to be paid upon completion of Milestone #4.
perturbation.explanation: The contract uses the terms “Fees” and “Costs/Charges” without defining if they have distinct meanings. The ambiguity could lead to disputes about whether certain expenses are included within the fixed fee, or if they can be billed separately.

perturbation.original_text:
Based on the current requirements and this SOW, Seattle Software Developers estimates that this project will take around six [4] months of
development, testing, and deployment. This estimate may change depending on unforeseen circumstances or requirements. We estimate that the
website (Customer Portal) will take 3 months to complete because this will be the priority.
perturbation.changed_text:
Based on the current requirements and this SOW, Seattle Software Developers projects that this project will take around six [4] months of
development, testing, and deployment. This projection may change depending on unforeseen circumstances or scope. We estimate that the
website (Customer Portal) will take 3 months to fulfill because this will be the priority.
perturbation.explanation: The terms "estimates", "projects", "requirements" and "scope", and "complete" and "fulfill" are used interchangeably without defining if they are different metrics. This ambiguity could lead to disputes about whether certain milestones are included within the project as a whole, if there are any expenses associated, and when the project would be over.
